actions.text: Amendment SA 2112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2112 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S14009-14011; text: CR S14010) To require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish university-based research, extension, and educational programs to implement biobased energy technologies, products, and economic diversification in rural areas of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2112 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Frist.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2112 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to establish university-based research, extension, and educational programs to implement biobased energy technologies, products, and economic diversification in rural areas of the United States.
